thread.title: BRIEF-Celanese Announces Gur Capacity Expansion At Its China Engineered Materials Manufacturing Facility

title: BRIEF-Celanese Announces Gur Capacity Expansion At Its China Engineered Materials Manufacturing Facility

organizations.name: china engineered materials manufacturing facility reuters

text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Celanese Corp:
* CELANESE ANNOUNCES GUR® CAPACITY EXPANSION AT ITS NANJING, CHINA ENGINEERED MATERIALS MANUFACTURING FACILITY
* CELANESE - NEW PRODUCTION LINE AT CO’S NANJING MANUFACTURING FACILITY EXPECTED TO ADD ABOUT 15KT PER YEAR OF GUR UHMW-PE PRODUCT CAPACITY BY 2019
* CELANESE - SEEING MARKET GROWTH FOR GUR IN LITHIUM ION BATTERY SEPARATORS FOR ELECTRIC VEHICLE APPLICATIONS, RESULTING IN 20% TO 30% GROWTH IN DEMAND/YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
